_meta.description: Market context for the Indebtedness Covenant — how basket sizing, ratio debt capacity, and structural protections vary across market segments

LMM.contribution_debt: Capped (0-50%), must be unsecured if permitted
LMM.ratio_debt_IED: No IED (bank preferred); if permitted, full MFN/maturity/WAL protections
LMM.overall_posture: Most conservative — small baskets, no ratio debt outside credit agreement

CMM.ratio_debt_IED: Permitted with full protections — MFN, non-guarantor cap, maturity/WAL
CMM.overall_posture: Moderate — baskets sized for M&A flexibility with structural protections

UMM.ratio_debt_IED: Permitted — MFN sunset 12-18 months; 'no worse' and FCCR prongs rejected; inside maturity basket 50-100% EBITDA
UMM.overall_posture: Aggressive — large baskets, ratio debt standard, structural protections narrower

BSL.ratio_debt_IED: Standard; may lack maturity/WAL; MFN sunset
BSL.overall_posture: Most aggressive — reflects competitive syndication dynamics

bank_preferred.structure: Credit facilities + fixed dollar general basket + acquisition debt (DLS Row 79)
bank_preferred.protections: MFN on all pari debt; non-guarantor cap; maturity/WAL limits; no inside maturity except bridges
bank_preferred.earnouts: Always 'Indebtedness', capped, measured at maximum obligation

sponsor_push.structure: Credit facilities + IED + ratio debt + incurred acquisition ratio debt + general basket with growers
sponsor_push.ied: Full IED at multiple leverage tiers; MFN sunset; 'no worse' for acquisition debt
sponsor_push.protections: MFN sunset 12-18 months; relax maturity/WAL; inside maturity basket 50-100% EBITDA
sponsor_push.contribution_debt: 100-200% of contributions; may be secured; no time limit
sponsor_push.reclassification: Broad — general debt, RP, investment, AA capacity all reallocable to incremental

geneva.intercompany: Non-loan party to loan party: note required, pledged if >$25M

scientific_games.contribution_debt: 100% of cash and FMV contributions (same as Geneva)
